synopsis.text: She drenched in crimson, the stranger barges into their tranquil abode, her warning cry echoing through the halls: 'They're coming!' The unsuspecting family soon discovers the horrifying truthâ€”'they' are flesh-eating zombies! Amidst the chaos, their unlikely hero emerges: their faithful and well-equipped maid, ready to face the undead invasion head-on. As the master and his young daughter grapple with the terrifying reality, their trusted servant takes charge, armed with more than just her usual cleaning supplies. Prepare for a chilling tale of survival and unexpected bravery in the face of a zombie apocalypse!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
